nodes.text: The Boz Pity Salient was an area of space located within the Kreetan Narrows, a region of the Outer Rim Territories that was part of Hutt Space at the end of the Clone Wars.

This region was named after the nearby planet Boz Pity, which was located in the Halla sector of the Mid Rim. The planet Nar Kreeta, which was located in Hutt Space, sat near the tip of the Boz Pity Salient of the Kreetan Narrows.
In 19 BBY, following the end of the Sy Myrthian Insurrection, the Galactic Empire seized the Kreetan Narrows, including the Boz Pity Salient, in the pursuit of Separatist holdouts.
The Boz Pity Salient was later incorporated into the Suolriep sector.
